# atproto Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "atproto" {
  handle       = "example.com"
  app_password = "m54s-q9r3-4w8n-6x7v"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_password` (String) Your app password. OAuth Tokens are currently not supported
- `handle` (String) Your atproto handle or did
